column1: Uchi////We heard a lot of hype about this restaurant from friends so we decided to have a birthday celebration there. We had a private room and the waitress said to trust her to recommend our entire menu - we shouldn't have. The dishes came out fast but were taken away just as fast
column2: almost like they were rushing us out of there. Our party enjoyed most of the food and wine but as hosts
column3: we were not impressed; definitely not worth the $1
